name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 24 (Released) Beijing. A woman from Chongqing took her child out to set up a stall to shine shoes. The woman said that she had come to Beijing for eight years to treat her child who had a brain tumor. Her husband was working outside and didn't care about the child. The child's medical treatment costs more than 10,000 yuan per month, and the surgery costs hundreds of thousands of yuan. When she said this, the woman burst into tears.
The woman's mother is still running takeout outside at an old age, working more than ten hours a day and earning 3,000 to 4,000 yuan a month. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894056493743472641/pu/img/7QY8OlPCMEgV_wnz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Trump administration plans to impose high fees on Chinese shipping companies and all Chinese-made ships when they enter US ports.
The Office of the United States Trade Representative (USTR) recently issued a comprehensive sanctions proposal against China's shipping industry, imposing millions of dollars in fees on Chinese shipping companies and Chinese-made ships every time they call at US ports, and promoting the "national goods and national fortune" of the United States.
According to data from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, in 2024, China's shipbuilding completion volume accounted for 55.7% of the world market share, new orders accounted for 74.1%, and backlog orders accounted for 63.1%. All three indicators ranked first in the world for 15 consecutive years.
This policy will directly hit Chinese shipping and logistics giants such as China Ocean Shipping Group (Cosco). Cosco is the world's largest shipping company in terms of capacity. According to US government statistics, as of January 2024, China operated about 19% of the world's... through large state-owned enterprises including Cosco...
fullContent:
特朗普政府计划对中国航运公司以及所有中国制造的船只进入美国港口时征收高额费用。
 美国贸易代表办公室（USTR）近日发布一项针对中国航运业的全面制裁提案，对中国航运公司和中国制的造船舶每次挂靠美国港口征收数百万美元的费用，并促进美国「国货国运」。
 据工信部数据，2024年中国造船完工量占世界市场份额的55.7%、新接订单量占74.1%、手持订单量占63.1%，三大指标均连续15年全球第一。
 这一政策将直接打击中国远洋海运集团（Cosco）等中国航运及物流巨头。Cosco是全球运力最大的航运公司。据美国政府统计，截至2024年1月，中国通过包括Cosco在内的大型国有企业运营了全球约19%的商船队。
 此外，该提案还将影响非中国企业，如马士（Maersk）和地中海航运（MSC）等大型航运公司，它们近年从中国船厂采购了大量船只。许多大型货轮会频繁挂靠多个港口，因此这一政策将对全球航运业产生广泛影响。
 USTR的提议获得工会支持，但零售商可能持反对意见，担忧额外成本将转嫁至消费者。该提案现已开放公众评论，并预计于3月举行公开听证会。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 25, a college student recalled his high school experience: there was no 10-minute break between classes, the teacher arrived early and stayed in class, and because the teacher occupied all the time, he could only squeeze out the lunch break to do homework. The teacher could not sit during class, and he would be fined if he was caught. Students who made mistakes would be beaten by the head teacher. Because of living in a high-pressure environment for a long time, he was overwhelmed and even wanted to hang himself with shoelaces one night... https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894070775381946368/pu/img/IyrI4aPAQpfbuSFU.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A team led by Shi Zhengli, an expert at the Wuhan Institute of Virology, found that there is a new coronavirus in bats, which invades cells in a similar way to the coronavirus, which means that the bat coronavirus may be at risk of spreading to humans. Shi Zhengli and her Wuhan Institute of Virology were previously embroiled in controversy over the origin of the coronavirus due to suspicions of laboratory leaks. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkkaWnPWQAAQWws.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The United Nations adopted a resolution on "Promoting a Comprehensive, Just and Lasting Peace in Ukraine". The draft resolution received 93 votes in favor, 18 against, and 65 abstentions.
Among them, 18 countries including the United States and Russia voted against; China abstained.
The resolution requires Russia to immediately withdraw its troops from Ukraine, immediately stop hostile actions against Ukraine, and stop attacks on key energy infrastructure. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gkkro5xbkAszQRC.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, two Xinjiang women complained about being blocked from finding accommodation in Shanghai. The agent told them that "foreigners can stay in Shanghai, but many places don't allow people from Xinjiang to stay." The two women questioned: "Am I not Chinese? Isn't Xinjiang Chinese? Shouldn't I enjoy the rights of Chinese citizens?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894112501534756864/pu/img/fQ6-NJK0M7oNCPhm.jpg

content:
Netizen contribution
The Korea University Chinese Students and Scholars Association has issued a new recruitment announcement, requiring applicants to adhere to the leadership of the Communist Party of China. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gklk84JbkAA7fIx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 20, the victims of Zhongzhi Group Dingrong Trust went to the case filing hall of Shanyang District Court in Jiaozuo, Henan Province, and requested to file a case against the illegal and criminal acts of the "fake gold exchange" in the jurisdiction. , 
As a result, they were blocked by the court and refused to file the case. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894160461983088640/pu/img/EkVxSZpSX-k7GP1T.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a student from Ziyang Middle School in Ziyang City, Sichuan Province, exposed on Sichuan Government that Ziyang Middle School dismissed many cleaners and asked students to clean the school and teachers' offices.
There are also problems such as never posting notices in the parent group about the payment of supplementary lessons, and always asking students to bring cash, ranging from several thousand to several hundred. Day students also have to pay accommodation fees even if they do not live in the dormitory; in the canteen, many things are not clearly marked, and the selling prices are higher than the market price outside. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gklu7GabkAE_rWi.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
University is becoming more like a high school
On February 23, a Xiaohongshu netizen complained that in the second semester of the junior year, the counselor not only confiscated the mobile phones, but also confiscated them until graduation.
In the comment area, a netizen from the University of Science and Technology said that the university conducts dormitory inspections at 9 pm, and students who are found playing games will be punished by standing. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkmZSmOWAAAyPEt.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 25. Zhijiang, Hubei. A man reported that the spinal fixator implanted in a patient at Zhijiang Zhang's Orthopedic Hospital broke, causing the patient's spinal pain. The man said that before the patient's surgery, the hospital promised to use imported high-quality instruments. But the instruments used in the actual surgery were not the instruments that the hospital had promised. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894252887162982400/pu/img/P-y09UNsDQrXvFnO.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24 (posted), a blogger went to the labor market and told the workers that there was a 20 billion project for the workers to do. In fact, he asked the workers to watch "Nezha 2". The workers asked the blogger for their wages as soon as they arrived, so the blogger kicked them all out of the car. After a lot of effort, a few people got together to watch the movie. In the end, the workers said the movie was not real. The blogger said he was very disappointed. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894306099462914048/pu/img/ysHnK3oJnD0xloQX.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, local time, US President Trump met with visiting French President Emmanuel Macron at the White House. During the joint press conference, Macron rarely interrupted Trump and corrected Trump's statement that European countries provided aid funds to Ukraine in the form of "loans". Macron immediately interrupted Trump and refuted that 60% of the total European aid funds to Ukraine were "paid" out of pocket, and Europe's aid to Ukraine was the same as that of the United States, including loans, guarantees and (free) grants. Macron said that Europe has frozen more than $200 billion in Russian assets, "This is not a loan collateral because it does not belong to us." Trump responded: "If you believe this, I have no objection"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 24, the Korea University Chinese Scholars Association issued a new recruitment announcement. In addition to being a Chinese student studying at Korea University, applicants are also required to love the Communist Party and firmly support the leadership of the Communist Party of China.
Public information shows that the Korea University Chinese Scholars Association was established under the guidance and assistance of the Education Department of the Chinese Embassy in South Korea. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gkn2rizXEAAlQev.jpg

content: New York Times: North Korean workers were sent to Chinese distant-water fishing vessels to earn foreign exchange for generals. They were unable to go ashore for eight years and suffered exploitation close to slave labor. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gkn_rQjWcAEhGb4.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 24 (Released) Yunfu, Guangdong. Lawyer Zhang Jinghui asked the judge to let him copy the electronic evidence in the client's mobile phone, and said that if we are not allowed to copy and only allowed to view it on the computer screen, we will complain to the judge and expose it online. The judge immediately got angry when he heard the complaint: "What do you mean? Are you threatening me? Do you have the right to complain about me?" He even cursed at the lawyer. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894332362886189058/pu/img/LpyJdfqGkcdcboSc.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Global Digital Human Rights Conference: Last year, the number of global Internet blockades hit a new high. Last year, there were at least 296 Internet blockades in 54 countries around the world. This is double the number in 2016. Myanmar blocked the Internet 85 times last year, making it the country with the most serious Internet blockades. The Myanmar military government cooperated with the Great Firewall of China to block the Internet. China only blocked the Internet twice last year, but the severity of the blockade data may be underestimated because it is difficult to obtain relevant information from China. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkoInXNaQAAYddz.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Blogger "Rui Jing" selected cases from the past year and sorted them by the length of sentences given to corrupt officials. He concluded: 120 million (million) 112 (years); 340 million (million) 123 (years); 560 million (million) 145 (years); more than 1 million (million) starts at three years. Needless to say, those with hundreds of millions will be sentenced to death (usually suspended sentences, but the real death penalty will cost more than 1 billion). He also worked out the "amount to period ratio" of punishment, which simply means how much money is paid per year. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkoNt-NWwAA-9ZM.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on the 24th that if the negotiations on the Russian and American presidents' initiative to end the war can achieve results, Russia will stop fighting in Ukraine. Moscow's demands are: the surrender of the Ukrainian army, the complete or partial cession of five regions by Kiev, the announcement that Ukraine will no longer join NATO, and the establishment of a new regime that advocates "de-Nazification". https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkoQhkkbkAoY29w.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 20, Zunjie Auto compared the Zunjie S800 and Maybach S680 at the launch conference. On February 24, a man posted a video saying that he was the owner of the Maybach S680 that lost control at the Zunjie S800 launch conference, and said that without his knowledge, the vehicle was taken by Zunjie officials for violent testing. On January 21, the car was towed back and found to have problems such as damaged bumpers and deformed wheels. Until today (24th), Zunjie officials have not given a reasonable explanation. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894350065546006530/pu/img/lVWwLv3_jEI9G786.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangxi Dinghui Construction Group issued a notice that all employees are on standby: In view of the current market downturn, it is difficult to advance work. Most positions have no specific work arrangements. Since February 11, all employees of the group have entered a standby state.
The company was established in 2002. The group has a registered capital of 366 million yuan and a working capital of 220 million yuan. It has been selected as one of the top 100 private enterprises in Guangxi for two consecutive years. It has been in the limelight during the big infrastructure boom, but now it has fallen into this situation due to the market downturn. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkoZkfOXYAAmzDk.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, three people, including Ye Zhan, a doctoral candidate in the Department of Chinese Literature at National Chengchi University, issued a joint statement on social media, accusing Wang Can, a postdoctoral researcher at the School of Journalism at Fudan University, of maliciously plagiarizing four master's theses in Taiwan, including their own, which were "word for word", "including footnotes" and even "including charts and graphs". Most of the four articles suspected of plagiarism were published in major Chinese top journals (C journals). On February 25, Fudan University issued a notice: The report was true and it had been delisted in January 2025.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Putin supports Trump's proposal to halve the military budgets of Russia, the United States and China. "I think it is a good idea to cut military spending. If the United States cuts 50%, we will also cut 50%. If China is willing, it can also join."
Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs: "China's limited defense spending is entirely necessary to defend national sovereignty, security and development interests, and to maintain world peace." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkopwCPWEAAmpWK.png

content:
State Council Information Office: Last year, the per capita disposable income of rural residents reached 23,119 yuan, a year-on-year increase of 6.3%, and the income ratio between urban and rural residents continued to narrow.
As a result, netizens slapped the government in the comments section: "Ganzhou in Jiangxi did not reach it, Zhuzhou in Hunan did not reach it, Suining did not reach it, Suzhou did not reach it, Fuyang did not reach it..." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkowGU6bkAEOMIL.jpg

content: On February 24, the third anniversary of the Russian-Ukrainian war, Ukrainian Mihalo thanked the Chinese for their support and help in Chinese. "Thanks to them, people who have suffered from the war disasters in the past three years can get medicine, food and other supplies." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894382087580651523/pu/img/Oqubgk6FIdmacHDu.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
7 Chinese teenagers were arrested for slashing 2 classmates in Tokyo.
Japanese media reported on the 23rd that 7 Chinese junior high school students were suspected of beating and slashing 2 Chinese students with kitchen knives on Hirakawa Bridge in Katsushika District on November 17 last year.
Police: The suspect and the victim were studying at a local Japanese language school, and the two sides had a quarrel before the incident. According to the video provided by the witness, there were as many as 20 people gathered at the scene at that time, and the police are still tracking down other suspects https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gko-SvKWUAAuEPZ.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported online that when a student privately asked him about homework, Professor Peng Zerun of Hunan Normal University sent the chat record with the student to a class group of nearly 500 people, accusing the student of "Are you used to relying on your mother at home?"... https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkpEBLMasAAL7Z1.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Taiwan Coast Guard detained Chinese mainland crew members after submarine cable was damaged.
Taiwan Coast Guard said that at around 3 a.m. today, submarine cables broke in the Taiwan-Penghu waters, and a cargo ship registered in Togo, a West African country, anchored and stranded in the waters involved. The Coast Guard stopped the cargo ship and took it back to Anping Port in Tainan for investigation.
The Coast Guard pointed out that the cargo ship was found to have Chinese capital background after investigation, and the eight crew members on board were all Chinese mainland nationals.
The authorities will further clarify whether the cable break was caused by deliberate sabotage or accident, but do not rule out China's harassment in the gray area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Caixin.com: Gu Ailing's training expenses are included in the fiscal budget, attracting attention, with an annual amount of more than 47 million yuan. Previously, the Beijing Municipal Sports Bureau or its directly affiliated institutions had included Gu Ailing and Zhu Yi's training expenses in the fiscal budget for 2023 and 2024, respectively, involving project funds of 47.076 million yuan and 1.45 million yuan respectively. Caixin's report has been deleted. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkpLVJ0XoAAVV7L.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Beijing Sports Bureau announced the 2025 fiscal budget information. Among them, the funding for the training and competition of outstanding athletes this year is 48.14 million yuan. The document mentioned: "Our center has signed the "Athlete Service Agreement" with Gu Ailing and Zhu Yi. Gu Ailing and Zhu Yi will continue to represent Beijing in various events... Strive to qualify for the 2026 Milan Winter Olympics and achieve excellent results. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkpQ9j6a0AAlJm7.jpg
